content.raw:
Hi can I clarify that you have tried the steps listed here: [Setup VRX on Host](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall)

These steps still work for me. Please do ensure Gazebo version is at least 9.11.0 \(check by using `dpkg -l | grep gazebo`\). Please reply if you have any other issues or resolve the issue with comments on how you solved it if it works. Thanks!
